author: m.kalinin
content: Yes, CL is unaware of this setting. It has a matter for EL clients only as `(block_number; block_hash)` reflects already existing functionality to whitelist a block with exact hash to make EL client sticking with specified chain -- this is required to support `TERMINAL_BLOCK_HASH` override on EL side. CL doesn't need block number to support this override
